Taxon name.Name: Vanrija humicola
Taxon name.Synonymy:
Current name: Vanrija humicola (Daszewska) R.T. Moore 1980 MB#112012 
Basionym: Torula humicola Daszewska 1912 MB#101228 
Obligate synonyms:

Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
Applications: alkali-tolerant at pH 10 (Syst. Appl. Microbiol. 13: 394-397, 1990); produces lipases active at pH 5.5 and 7.5 (J. Ind. Microbiol. 13: 242-248, 1994); control strain for API ATB 32 C
